attributes.action: set an example by having all motorway street lights switched off.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of government exhortations to the population to cut down on domestic electricity usage, the Department of Transport should be setting an example.

All motorway users; cars; motorcycles; lorries and buses have perfectly good headlights and so there is no need for the motorway network to be lit at night.
